info.title: Eden AI
info.description: Enhance your apps and workflows with the power of Eden AI ! Integrate advanced AI features such as natural language processing, image recognition, document parsing, audio processing, generative AI and more.

post.description: Converts normal language text into speech.

providers.description: Enter the names of the providers seperated by a coma

language.description: Enter the language of your text

option.description: Choose the gender voice. MALE or FEMALE.

settings.description: Enter the model you want like this. Check our doc to configure it.

rate.description: Increase or decrease the speaking pitch. An integer between 100 and -100.

pitch.description: Increase or decrease the speaking rate. An integer between 100 and -100.

volume.description: Increase or decrease the audio volume. An integer between 100 and -100.

audio_format.description: Specify the audio format in which the audio will be generated.

sampling_rate.description: The synthesis sample rate (in hertz) for this audio.

post.description: Detects adult explicit content in images, that is generally inappropriate for people under the age of 18 and includes nudity, sexual activity and pornography...

parameters.name: providers
parameters.description: Enter the names of the providers seperated by a coma
parameters.default: amazon, google, microsoft, sentisight, picpurify, api4ai, clarifai

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Choose the file you want to analyse

post.description: Generates text based on a given prompt.

providers.description: Enter the names of the providers seperated by a coma

temperature.description: A number between 0 and 1. Higher values mean the model will take more risks.

max_tokens.description: An integer between 1 and 2048. The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion.

settings.description: Enter the model you want like this. Check our documentation to configure it.
